Articles.Content:
Are Kerbodine tanks no longer usable on spaceplanes, or are mine missing? I feel like I may have been cleaning mods late last night and accidentally deleted the extra large kerbodine parts somehow...

- - - Updated - - -

I've decided that all kerbodine parts are missing from my KSP... I don't know what to do.

re-download KSP and it will come with a fresh "NASAMission" folder containing all the Kerbodyne stuff. You can feel free to reinstall the whole game or just stick that folder back into GameData as you like.

In futurz: be careful what you delete! As you have learned, not all the "stock" stuff is in the "stock" folder any more

re-download KSP and it will come with a fresh "NASAMission" folder containing all the Kerbodyne stuff. You can feel free to reinstall the whole game or just stick that folder back into GameData as you like.

In futurz: be careful what you delete! As you have learned, not all the "stock" stuff is in the "stock" folder any more

I was hoping I wouldn't have to do that... Eh. Not a big deal. I'll do it later this week and copy over all my files
